## EditorPlugin.onFiles() method

May be provided to let the plugin respond to file \[`paste` events\](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/Element/paste\_event) or drop events

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onFiles?(files: File[]): void | {
        state?: StateTypeSerializedType<S>;
    };
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  files | <code>File[]</code> | The \[FileList\](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/FileList) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void | {
        state?: StateTypeSerializedType<S>;
    }`
